dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6964 RH: To authorize leases of up to 99 years for lands held in trust for the Confederated Tribes of the Chehalis Reservation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Strickland (for herself, Mr. Kilmer, and Ms. Herrera Beutler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Additional sponsors: Mr. Smith of Washington, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mr. Newhouse, Mrs. Rodgers of Washington, Ms. Jayapal, Ms. DelBene, and Ms. Schrier
Reported from the Committee on Natural Resources; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To authorize leases of up to 99 years for lands held in trust for the Confederated Tribes of the Chehalis Reservation.

section.header: Confederated tribes of the Chehalis Reservation leasing authority
section.text: Subsection (a) of the first section of the Act of August 9, 1955 (25 U.S.C. 415(a)), is amended in the second sentence by inserting , land held in trust for the Confederated Tribes of the Chehalis Reservation after Crow Tribe of Montana.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
